snippet.title: TerraScape - Official Early Access Launch Trailer
snippet.description: TerraScape is a unique deck-based city-builder puzzle game that allows players to build the kingdom of their choosing. With the random selection of cards to draw from, procedural maps and challenges means that players will have to strategize on how to expand their settlements based on the cards they were dealt. TerraScape is available now on PC Steam Early Access.
